email_body:
Dear Jennifer Singer,

I hope this email finds you well. As the lead DevOps engineer at SafeSecurity, your expertise is highly valued.

We have recently discovered a critical security vulnerability that requires immediate attention. In order to protect our organization and ensure the safety of our data, we kindly request that you click on the link below to access an important security update:

Click Here to Access Important Security Update

Your prompt action is essential to safeguarding our systems and maintaining our strong security posture.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me or our cybersecurity team.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Megan Thompson
